原文標題: 【删除】夹缝下的武汉肾病患者
English title: "Deleted" Wuhan kidney disease patients under the cracks
English content:
"Just save us, there is really no way."
 

 On the morning of January 31, Wuhan City, Zhou Zhe, called the first line of rescue for his father on his Weibo. Zhou Zhe's father is dialysis patient, we need to go to Wugong Hospital for three dialysis every week. He recalled that his father had high fever, vomiting, and the whole body. He suspected that due to the seriousness of "the previous period, I went to the hospital for dialysis, there was no protective measures such as dialysis," Father, therefore infected new crown pneumonia. "
 

 In the next three days, Zhou Zhe's father was diagnosed with "height suspected", but because the kit was short-priced, the original dialysis hospital refused to follow the treatment for the elderly, and he could not be confirmed by the new crown. Pneumonian site hospital reception.
 

 Hemodialysis is a conventional treatment method for the treatment of urgent, chronic renal failure. The excess moisture and toxin removal were removed by leveraging blood in vitro using dialysis, filtration, etc., and then followed by the patient. Dialysis patients generally need to go to the hospital dialysis in the hospital for 1 to 3 dialysis every week, 3 to 4 hours each time. In addition to kidney transplant, patients with renal failure need lifelong dialysis. Once the dialysis is interrupted, it may endanger life safety.
 

 Zhou Zhe recalled that in those days, they seek medical attention every day, "Just like moving infection, they are also very afraid to transmit to others, but there is no way."
 

 On February 2nd, Zhou Zhe Father finally queued a nucleic acid detection in the hospital, but did not wait until the test results, the elderly have been unfortunately passed on February 3.
 

 The same intense and rapid arrival huge changes, also happened in the family.
 

 Since February 1, the party has been looking for a bed in daily dialysis while infection with neozopp pneumonia. Fang returned "People", father needs to go to Hubei Provincial Hospital for two dialysis because of diabetic kidney failure. Three weeks ago, the mother who had a fever and fatigue with his father on weekdays, and CT showed a double lung infection, but because of the confirmed diagnosis, the condition was suddenly turned straight within eight days, and he died in the morning of January 31.
 

 The next day, I have not yet from the sadness of my mother. I took my father to the hospital to investigate, I found that my father's double lung was also infected (after diagnosis of neoguan pneumonia). The hospital refused to go back to the father to continue to do next dialysis due to not the new crown pneumonia.
 

 Fang returns to the new ganggong pneumonia fixed-point hospital mentioned in the previous government document, "Some said that the hospital is still transforming, does not have conditions, some have been full of bed, I have already ran 8 days, Still there is no bed, yesterday, a little community inform us to go to the hospital to do hospitalization, the hospital says no one who is going to the hospital, can not be charged. "We will report, wait for the news", give you this sentence. There is no other way. "
 

 Because Wuhan has "banned car", the traffic is inconvenient, the return can only rush every time the electric vehicle is running between the hospital and the home. Last week, he took his father to find a hospital to do dialysis, "I rode a free electric car for 2 hours, I changed three cars in the middle, I fell, my dad was being folded."
 

 More than 10,000 people in Wuhan need to regularly go to the hospital dialysis, the spread of the epidemic, the high-risk risk of infection, the city and the private cars, and the private cars that will be banned to a embarrassing situation and gray. Range.
 

 Public welfare organization "Kidney · The same person" initiator Zhi'an told the "People" reporter, for ordinary dialysis patients who did not infect new coronal pneumonia virus, with the hospital, public welfare organization, media reports, there is another turnover The dialysis room, the dialysis is not a problem, and the underlying urgency is the material and travel.
 

 "For example, a mask. One dialysis requires three masks (once dialysis is about 3 to 4 hours. There is a need for one in the dialysis room. Many patients do not have a mask ... others can stay at home for a week. I don't go out for ten or a half months, there is no problem, but they can't. If you don't go dialysis, they have no way to maintain life. "Zhi'an said.
 

 However, Zhi'an told "People", for many dialysis patients diagnosed or suspected of neoguanpi pneumonia, "they are facing very embarrassing. I look for a bed."
 

 At present, Wuhan has arranged 7 hospitalities for kidney failure and hemodialysis. However, according to the story of multiple kidney dialysis, the hospital does not accept individuals and requires community referrals. In several days, the beds of these hospitals are basically full of full members.
 

 In addition, "characters" also learned about another special group in an interview - some people with chronic nephropathy, due to the long period of lungs, chronic pulmonary inflammation has been long. But in this special period of "lung" will be paid to the special period of attention, they are asked to repeatedly do nucleic acid detection to prove that they have no new crown pneumonia. They were illuminated, but they were told that the accuracy of the nucleic acid detection is to be considered. They can't go to 7 hospitals, nor are they accepted by ordinary dialysis. They became real people with dialysis.
 

 In a huge battle against the virus, some people were placed in a honesty and gray.
 

 The "character" reporter interviewed the family of dialysis patients in the three new coronary pneumonia epidemics, a family said: "In this process, everyone will always see the focus is the main body, in fact, there are many clip-shadow people. In fact, these people are not in a small number, you have taken his quantity, there is really a lot. "
  
 1
 The following is a self-reported by Lu. His grandmother is superimposed in dialysis patients, and Patients who have neoguanpi pneumonia are launched on February 5th.
 

 My grandmother is 78 years old. I have been dialysis for three years. I have to go to Wuhan University Affiliated South South Hospital dialysis 3 times.
 

 At the beginning of January, grandmother began to have a fever, uncomfortable, to the hospital to say double lung infection, then new crown pneumonia has not been completely explosive, it is about seven or eight days in the hospital, and then burn it. The hospital will make the hospital. However, the problem of pulmonary infection is not completely solved, but it is just that the situation is better.
 

 On January 25th, the grandmother began to have a fever. At that time, the new crown pneumonitis had already been built, and we are also very afraid, because she wants to go to the hospital for three dialysis every week, and the dialysis room is a patient with a poor immunity. So we worry that it is no new coronary pneumonia. At that time, we took a grandmother to the Zhongnan Hospital to shoot CT, and did blood test. The CT result is a highly suspected new zocial pneumonia, but when the Central South Hospital has no kit, you can't do nucleic acid testing, let us go home from home.
 

 Grandma is a day than one day, and after February 1, the Zhongnan Hospital has refused my grandmother to dialysis. The reason is that the dialysis of the Zhongnan Hospital has the isolation and dialysis ward of patients with new coronal pneumonia. If it is a new crown pneumonia into dialysis, a dozen people have a large room, it may infect others.
 

 It is not possible to dialysis, and the body of our grandmother is very fast. Our whole family turns to the Liyuan Hospital affiliated to Huacai, just arrived at a batch of kits.
 

 Originally, the results were taken the next day. The result was the next day, the Pear Garden Hospital said that the results were lost, and they were re-made. At that time, my grandmother had been weak, I need someone to help, basically can't walk away.
 

 Wait a day, get the result, is negative. We are very happy, at that time, we took the result to bring our grandmother to the South South Hospital. I hope that the grandmother can be hospitalized and continue dialysis. However, the director of the Nephrology Medicine Department of Zhongnan Hospital saw the results of our nucleic acid test, and he looked down at CT. He is, "Through this CT observation, I think this is basically new crown pneumonia. I don't know this nucleic acid detection As a result, there is a certain error in nucleic acid detection. "
 

 So he refused to hurt my grandmother. I don't blame him. Because I later told me that a child of a health center told me that the accuracy of nucleic acid detection kit is not high. I don't know how many families have delayed the treatment opportunities because this kit has been delayed, and how many medical staff are infected because the kit is misunderstood.
 

 The doctor said that he did not recognize this result, let us go to Wuhan, the seven hospitals of the city. But we went to the South South Hospital to see his afternoon, grandmother is coma, and then doing nucleic acid testing, people have shoveed.
 

 The doctor said that he could not force, because there is no bed, no medical resources, he can't accept it, we want to think about it.
 

 During our contact community, the community helped us contact the Health Jiterary Committee. The Health Jiterary Committee told us through the community. They can't do it. Because there is no bed, there is no treatment.
 

 We also contacted a lot of hospitals, and the ordinary hospital did not receive heat, they all said that my grandmother is suspected of neozel pneumonia patients, to go to the hospital. We also contact the fixed-point hospital of newzgong pneumonia, and the other parties have not been diagnosed, can't receive it.
 

 It is to fall into the dead cycle, and all hospitals do not accept. My grandmother is like a gray zone in the gym.
 

 We also played 120, saying that the patient was shoveed, the situation is very crisis, need first aid, 120 to give us the answer is that they have no way, they say that the premise of the ambulance is that we must first find the hospital that is willing to collect grandmother. Can you come over, otherwise the ambulance is coming or there is no place. He said that they have seen too much recently, and they have brought a patient to run three or four hospitals, all of which are rejected.
 

 From the afternoon of February 4th (February 5 afternoon), grandmother can only be lying at home, no reactions, yelling has not responded, only breathing, can not eat, water can't drink. (Editor's Note: On February 5 afternoon, the National Health Committee issued a "new coronavirus infected pneumonia diagnosis and treatment plan (trial fifth edition)", stipulates that CT image results as a clinical diagnostic case in Hubei Province .)
 

 Including me into some help groups, QQ groups, WeChat groups, many cases are similar to us, that is, many patients who are not newure (other diseases) are also help, because he does not get a basic treatment Assure.
 

 Before the lungs did not infection, my grandmother's body is good, she took a shower, there is no problem with eating, and the self-care ability is OK. However, since the epidemic occurred, life suddenly took a lot of changes. This change is very fast, a bit unreal. Because New Year's Eve, Grandma also ate the year with us.
 

 My two children, twins, just three months, grandmother has an old concept, I feel that I have been dialysis, it is a patient, seeing the baby's words, the baby is not good, so the New Year's Eve is the first time, hug Baby.
 

 At that time, the family also said that during the New Year, I have to find a photo of the family to take a photo of the four-year-in-life, and the results have not been filmed. This is a great regret. The whole thing is too fast, and now it is really like a war.
 

 This is also very embarrassed. Because the child is born, the family makes me go to the hospital, and I will meet you. Before there is no child, it is my grandmother to go to my grandmother.
 

 After the new crown pneumonia broke out, the family did not let me go, because there is a certain risk, I have it, I am young, but I have brought it back to the baby, it is a big risk. So I didn't see my grandmother for a long time. Including now she is shock at home, lying, dying, I want to see her, but my reason tells me. I am particularly uncomfortable in my heart.
 

 In fact, before the epidemic broke out, I have been in the hospital in the hospital. At the end of December last year, I went to the hospital with my wife to check after postpartum examination. At that time, new crown pneumonia has caused a hospital attention, because it has already set a separate fever clinic, separate quarantine, including the queue to do CT people Double, and the protective measures of the medical staff have already got up, wear a mask, but at that time, we didn't feel this unusual and tension at home. I can't feel on the road, because I rarely see someone wear a mask.
 

 At the time, I thought it was a little strange, because there were some news on the Internet, so after I went home, we didn't think that this thing may not seem to be so small, so easy, there may be some serious .
 

 At that time, we began to discourage the elders in the house, let them go out, don't go out to play, we have stopped our elders earlier. So before the epidemic is completely explosive, they also pay more attention, we have also started to hoard some masks, alcohol and 84 disinfectant.
 

 In fact, the spread of the small road is faster than official news. We have received many small news, including the public, including friends, and then we will give the elders at that time.
 

 I think we have experienced a history, this year is definitely a history. Even when you are SARS, it is said that it is a city, in fact, there is no sea. But now Wuhan is a solid city, and it is not only in Wuhan. The whole Hubei Province is sealed, so we have experienced history, and in this historical event, we lost their loved ones, experienced these dangers, this tense The years, as a person, I think everyone should not forget this.
 

 My relatives and friends around me, my classmates, people I know, almost every family have infected, diagnosed.
 

 I am very feeling with my grandmother. I have sent her to dialysis over the past three years. To be honest, if you haven't seen it, I saw the dialysis room for the first time, and the impact is very big. It is pumping out the blood from the body, and there is one in the machine and then lost in. Peeling life, then wash it, then put it in the feeling.
 

 But this conventional treatment means has no way to continue.
 

 During this process, the focus of everyone will always be in the main body. In fact, there are many people in shadows of the clips. In fact, these people are not in a small number, you put the quantity of him, really a lot.
 

 (Editor's note: After 8 hours of interview on February 5, Lu Fan told the "People" in WeChat: My grandmother has just passed away, thank you for your attention. It should be the attention of the media and the help of online. The District Health Jian Committee told us that the hospital stayed, but unfortunately, the grandmother waited.)
 

 2
 The following is Zhang Qiong's self-report, her mother Wei Ru Zhen was unable to continue in the original hospital dialy with chronic pneumonia.
 

 My mother is 79 years old, with uremia and various basic diseases, long-term kidney dialysis, three times a week. She has been dialysis in Wuhan Tianyou Hospital. After the hospital was levied for the third batch of fixed-point fever hospitals, the dialysis room was closed, and my mother turned to the Huangjia Lake Hospital of Wuhan University of Science and Technology.
 

 After that, the hospital asked us to take CT and blood test. After doing it, I found out that my mother's lungs were inflammation. Her lungs did have chronic pneumonia. This is three years ago, she has been in hospital due to heart failure. At that time, the doctor said that all organs of her body are going to failure, so there is inflammation is normal.
 

 Huangjiahu Hospital asked my mother to do a nucleic acid identification, we did a team in the People's Hospital for a night, and I looked with my lover, let my mother rest in the car. The result came out is negative, we took the results back to the Huangjia Lake, and the time (February 1) was dialyzed.
 

 On the 4th, we will go to dialysis. The hospital asked us to take a film, and CT has not changed before, and asked us to do nucleic acid testing. I have to take my mother to seek doctor, let them write my mother to write cough (she doesn't Symptoms existing) so that they are eligible for nucleic acid detection. That day we did two times, the seven hospitals once, the People's Hospital once, the result is all negative.
 

 On the 5th, we returned to Huangjiahu. I said that I didn't dialysis. My mother was dead. They played a call to CT's inspection department, and then gave dialysis. When I was about one time, the hospital said it is absolutely not Yes, as long as there is inflammation in the lungs, I will not receive it.
 

 I called the hospital leader, they said that I would like to study, after more than 2 hours, a secretary called me, saying that if there is a safe entry, it is not dialysis.
 

 My mother does not have a burning, no cough, and there is no breathing, all (neoguan pneumonia) symptoms are not. No matter how many times your nucleic acid is done, it is negative, nor is it. He now does not recognize the nucleic acid to detect this means, only to see the chest, as long as there is inflammation, it will not be charged.
 

 On the 6th morning, I ran several hospital dialysis rooms. I have a private custom hospital. I have been referred to everywhere. You have to ask, you ask, wait for the place, I haven't asked What happens directly, I just said that the bed is full, no collection. I also understand them, the nurse is all three classes, from 8 o'clock in the morning, it is still dialysis 10 o'clock in the evening.
 

 I played the city of Wuhan, the city guards and the district guards, all the hotlines, I have called, I can run the hospital. Every time the Phone of the Health Committee said to be reported. After reporting it, I will solve it, the community is also the same caliber as the hotline. After the report, I will reply to you, and there is no next.
 

 Once, the person who received the phone and said, "You talk to the hospital, let them learn about the" Notice on Doing a good job in the medical security of the new crown pneumonia]. "I listened to crying, I am a small citizen, I will read the document to them, they are now ignored me, what is the meaning?
 

 My mother's diabetes have been more than 20 years. The complications have coronary heart disease, uremia, all organs of her body are failure, including her urinary tract, and inflammation in the lungs. Really, she can't dialysis in time, the moisture in the body is swollen, swollen, and then oppressed the heart, the heart is uncomfortable. It also accumulates in the lungs. Will continue to have inflammation. If she is a patient, if they cannot learn most, it is quite a week.
 

 Sometimes I have eaten two dumplings for one day, still not hungry, because I am really anxious, I can't eat anything. I can't sleep at night. My mother is also very urgent. She said that I am not dialyzed, she is afraid that we are infected. I have to comfort her, say that I try to find it, you have no things, there is always a place to help you dialy.
 

 Patients who have received neoguan pneumonia are very poor, they do need treatment, but these dialysis patients are also people, and there is also the right to survive.
 

 Patients with treatment under the epidemic CCTV News
 

 (Editor's Note: On February 8, Zhang Qiong found a private blood release center of Hanyang as a mother, "I can give her to her, I have already thank him," she said. The frequency of dialysis is twice. She told her mother to try to control the intake of water. Zhang Qiong's prayer is that on February 13, they will not be refused by this private blood.)
 

  
 3
 The following is the readme of Dong Xue. She is a 25-year-old, native of Wuhan girl. While her father had a lung inflammation, she transplanted 9 months of kidney has reacted, and I went to the world throughout the dispensing.
 

 My father is 51 years old. I have done kidney transplantation in Hankou, 9 months ago, then the state is restored, higher than the average of ordinary kidney transplantation. However, his lung problem is a bit problem, one is previously dialysis due to improper operation, which causes lung water, and pumped about a pound of blood. During the renal transplantation, the lungs have produced nodules again, and there is a sick root of the lungs.
 

 On January 15th, my father began to have a fever. I ate antipyretics, I went to the hospital 18, Hankou Tongji Respiratory department excluded the likelihood of new coronaviruses, and kidney transplantants recommended that we handled hospitalization, emergency injections, and pneumonia Go down. We also got a hospitalization certificate, but at the same time, the epidemic control of Wuhan began to tighten, and the hospital said that my father's lungs were inflammation, let us go home to take medicine to treat, and wait until the epidemic is stable.
 

 After that, we have been talking to Tongji, there is no success, just give us a hanging water, we went to the community hospital to play. While treating pneumonia, we also listened to the doctor's recommendations to stop the anti-alcoholism, because the anti-alternating drugs were opposite to the antibiotics in the treatment of pneumonia, and it was reduced human immunity.
 

 On February 1st, my father had renal reaches of renal, almost no urination, with a maximum burn to 41 degrees, creatinine from 83 to 280. I can't go to the door, go to the hospital to go to the hospital, I am afraid of being infected with cross-infections, go home to contact the community, they can only screen if there is a newzgong pneumonia virus infection, and because of fever can't do any kidney function Related inspections.
 

 The next day, because of the case, the situation is really urgent, we go to Guanggu Tongji to do nucleic acid detection. If you can confirm, you can go to the hospital to treat, if it is negative, you can also go to the General Hospital. That day, my father took a day in Guanggu Tongji, including a variety of inspections, waiting for a total of more than ten hours in the hospital.
 

 The result came out is negative. My mother stayed in the Opto Valley for 10 hours and didn't see any doctor. Because the medical staff is busy with new gown pneumonia, it has exceeded the load, there is no time to help my mother, the hospital has no relevant experience of the doctor. I heard that many new neoguan pneumonia patients were discovered in the clinic, infected nurses, doctors, so my father is now there is no way to diagnose, and there is no way to completely rule out, and the hospitals in both sides can't go, we will find directions. I don't know which direction works.
 

 In fact, we also asked the respiratory experts of two and three major hospitals. They looked at the CT trend of my dad, and there was no doctor to say like neoguan pneumonia. Not new crown pneumonia, it can't find a hospital. My mother ran several non-fixed points in the past few days, I thought I was inserted into the tube (before dialysis, nephrotic patients need to intravenously inserted to introduce blood outside the body and transported back), once there is, Go to dialysis in time, can save a life. But those non-fixed hospitals, or the department is closed, there is no big bed, and there is no ability and condition.
 

 My father should return to the first hospital Hankou Tongji, I also understand that it is in the epidemic center, indeed no ability to accept my father. In Guanggu Tongji, we have also encountered a very enthusiastic young doctor before saying that if our nucleic acid test results are negative, they are definitely no problem. The result came out, (pause), for various reasons, may not know why, anyway, no. He can't help us.
 

 I didn't use Weibo, but I hope to let you know this thing as much as possible, watching one day, I can't let the relevant people, and then help this group.
 

 I have a burning in the New Year's Eve. In the Army General Hospital, I made a CT in 10 hours, and the lungs were slightly infected. Now it is basically better. But the doctor suggested that I isolate it, so I will live in another house of our family. I only have my mother to go to the hospital every day.
 

 I can only understand the situation with my parents through WeChat every day. My dad makes me don't go to the hospital to find him. Our family has raised pets, so there is a camera in the living room. I will watch my father lying on the sofa every day. They went out at 8 o'clock every morning and came back to 11 in the evening. I don't dare to call them, because the mobile phone in the hospital will increase the risk of infection. That is to watch the camera, see them at home, to wash your hands, disinfect, and then I dare to call them. I am afraid that they are too urgently, and I will forget to wash hands.
 

 In fact, if it is not in the epidemic, I will enter the hospital in time, I will be able to protect the hospital in time, and the kidney and people can guarantee, but in this case, there is no way to guarantee, and the tube is not inserted. On, there is no way.
 

 From the note, my father has chronic nephritis, and then worsened, until last year, kidney transplant surgery. My father has always wanted to buy a house in Hainan. When winter, Wuhan's winter is too cold, not suitable for him. Last year, the grandmother did the end of the year. We did not go back to the father's hometown, this year, because he was sick, he did not fill the horm. I won't catch a cold next year. My dad can realize the dream of Hainan's winter, I believe it.
 

 (Editor's Note: On February 4th, Dong Xue's parents came back to home at night, did not find where you can insert it. She can't let her own, decide whether the next day lets friends drive her back. Home, she will blame myself in the future. Her expectations are unlucky, the 6th in the morning, the father passed away.)
 

 (In order to protect the privacy of the interview, Fang back, Lu Fan, Dong Xue is the name)

Write all my words down:  the frontline medical care in Wuhan can persist in working for a while. The ordinary people who are locked at home should not worry about going to work now. Let's persist and get back our happy life. ""

The full article has about 4040 words, and it takes about 10 minutes to read it carefully
Lunch included two dishes and one soup. Sun Ping (pseudonym) made them for herself. She was the first-line medical care of an First-class Hospital at Grade 3 in Wuhan. ""To fight this virus, it depends on immunity and we must eat well.""
After lunch, she rode an electric scooter to go to work in the hospital. After traffic control, it was her most effective means of transportation.
A shift would last for 7 hours. ""I don't drink or eat during shift, and I even don't go to the toilet.""
On the one hand, it was very busy, the more important thing was that protective clothing and N95 masks were distributed in limited quantities.
Wearing a mask for a long time, her face was pressed with a deep scar. ""The rope is tied to the ear, like a knife.""
But this is also a kind of ""happiness""- only the medical N95 with extremely strict protection can produce such an effect. ""N95 can only be worn by the medical personnel who need to directly contact patients, and only one mask is distributed per day.""
The hospital provided a dormitory for the first-line medical care personnel. Sun Ping lived for two days and couldn't stand it. Their hospital is a typical small First-class Hospital at Grade 3, and there are more than 1,000 people in administrative logistics. ""Now about 20% personnel in all departments fallen ill. There are several suspended patients in our department.""
Living in the dormitory, she didn't dare to take off her mask when she slept. ""Because you don't know who might be “infected”, many people are now asymptomatic.""
Some colleagues temporarily had no symptoms, but because of the doctor's self-examination, they felt that they had been infected and ""feel uneasy"", they continuously took lung CT for 3 days in a row, which showed that ""it was normal for the first two days, and on the third day, the lungs showed that there was something really wrong.
Is it terror or not? ""
Lung CT is a highly accurate test method when there is no condition to take a test for diagnosis.
She lived apart from her family very early, and the girl persuaded her not to go to work again. ""Mom, don't go to work!
Aren’t you afraid?
Even if resigning will confiscate your professional qualification certificate, our family has money to live, and soon I can work and support our family. ""
Sun Ping cried. ""Of course I'm afraid. How can I not be afraid?
People around me fell down successively, I don't know if our small hospital can hold up. ""
""I want to tell the real situation that I have seen and known. I don't want to create panic. I don't want to chase anyone's responsibility. I just want ordinary people to know the real situation, and all parts of the country can pay attention to it from top to bottom."".
She also opened all the WeChat friends circle to me. On October 1, the National Day of 2019, the family went out to travel. She smiled brightly in the photo. ""Before the epidemic, my life was very happy.""
Besides the happy family, she also has a harmonious and friendly department environment. ""The atmosphere of our department is one of the best in the hospital.""
When seeing Lu Xiaohong with real name, the director of Wuhan Fifth Hospital, telling the media about the personal observation of Wuhan epidemic hiding, she praised her colleague's integrity and courage.
""The secretary of the Hubei Provincial Party Committee said that ‘Huanggang must not be turned into the second Wuhan' and hopes that other cities will not repeat the tragedy of Wuhan!""
Dressed neatly and closed her door, she shouted on WeChat, ""I go to work!
My protection is absolutely professional, don’t worry!
Write all my words down: just says that the frontline medical care in Wuhan can persist in working for a while. The ordinary people who are locked at home should not worry about going to work first. Let's persist and get back our happy life. ""
Sun Ping’s oral statement:
1. At the end of December and early January, we found that this virus was completely different from before. At that time, we called it ""virus lung.""
At the end of December, 2019, we saw a ""white lung"" dynamic CT transmitted from a large comprehensive First-class Hospital at Grade 3, and all the patients' lungs were eroded by viruses.
Ten-second video made people scared.
I asked our hospital's professional lung CT diagnostician, whether this would be a viral cold or other diseases.
""It's completely different, and nothing else will be as full and diffuse as this.""
He answered for sure.
At that time, some people thought it was ""suspected SARS"". Everyone was very sensitive and immediately put on standard protection-masks, hats and gloves.
Around December 30, it was reported at that time that ""the unexplained pneumonia in Wuhan has been quarantined and the results will be announced as soon as possible"", and we paid special attention to it, waiting for the confirmation notice from the top.
Within a few days, the hospital organized training, and the notice said ""viral pneumonia of unknown origin"", which was later referred to as ""viral lung"".
All departments were required to attend, the training materials were kept strictly confidential, and the notice said that those who take photos and rumor have serious consequences should be held accountable.
At the beginning of January, there were suspected patients in various hospitals. Some small hospitals did not accept fever patients and pushed them to other hospitals.
This situation was jointly reported to Wuhan Health Commission by several other hospitals, and the notice was issued from top, saying that the patients admitted to each hospital must be treated by themselves, blocking the opening of referral.
As Director Lu Xiaohong of Wuhan No.5 Hospital said, most hospitals were not infectious disease hospitals and did not have quarantined conditions.
Only the quarantined ward can be vacated urgently, and the respiratory medicine department, emergency department, fever clinic and intensive care unit of our hospital should be integrated to deal with it.
At that time, there was already a feeling of fighting hard. I believed all hospitals were prepared, but there was no announcement or reminder.
According to the regulations on the management of infectious diseases, hospitals did not have the authority to report suspected cases, and they must obey Wuhan Health Commission when releasing them.
At that time, the top asked us that all specimens were not allowed to be sent out. At that time, there was no special ""virus lung"" nucleic acid test reagent, and we could only rule out one by one whether it was caused by other known viruses. If not, the results, together with the lung CT diagnosis made by the first diagnosis of radiology department, were determined as ""virus lung suspected"".
2、
2. In mid-January, ""patchy infection lesions"" became a customary description among doctors, and medical staff were infected, but the hospital had no right to raise the protection level
In mid-January, our all departments had already entered a state of high tension, and at that time, it was heard that some suspected patients in hospitals had died.
The emergency department of every hospital was crowded with people, and the communication between hospitals was not good.
At that time, it was not allowed to write ""viral pneumonia"" in the medical certificate, but some hospitals wrote ""patchy infection lesions"". All hospitals were communicated, and many of similar cases were written according to this. If doctors saw that the patients coming to see a doctor with the initial diagnosis opinion of ""multiple patchy infection lesions in both lungs"" (equivalent to highly suspected), they basically understood what this means and know how to deal with it.
The medical personnel in the fever ward had put on protective clothing conditionally.
However, the protection level of the whole hospital had not been uniformly adjusted, and only when it reached the third level of protection, the medical personnel could be protected from infection to a greater extent.
However, from January 6 to January 10, Wuhan Municipal Health Commission did not issue a circular on ""unknown pneumonia"".
The notification that we have received from the Health Commission was on January 5: ""There were 59 patients diagnosed with viral pneumonia of unknown cause, and no clear evidence of human-to-human infection was found, and no medical personnel were found to be infected.""
At that time, no hospital in Wuhan was able to rise the protection level without authorization. During this period, it was also the time when medical personnel were most infected, and several colleagues in our hospital were infected.
The most deplorable thing was that the infection of more than a dozen medical personnel caused by the patient in Concord Neurosurgery.
In fact, during the operation on the night of January 7, doctors told each other to take care of the virus lung. However, at that time, the notification from the Health Commission was ""no clear evidence of human-to-human infection"", and the patient did not have any respiratory symptoms, so he had to operate according to the hospital's routine operation protection requirements.
At last, this patient became ill. On January 15th, he was diagnosed with COVID-19 infection, and the medical personnel were wronged because there was no ""negligence"" as mentioned by the outside world, and all the protection that could be done (at that time) had been done to the best.
In the announcement issued by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 16th, there was still no mention of the infection of medical personnel.
Like many medical personnel in other hospitals, I didn't know about this until the January 20. We all said that if Academician Zhong Nanshan hadn't told us about this, the doctors wouldn't know how many people would be dumped.
Even the front-line didn’t know anything, ordinary people didn't know the danger of ambush around them.
On January 18, it was the small Chinese New Year, people in Wuhan still attached great importance to this festival. Friends and family would have dinner together. The subway was full of people, and none of them wore masks.
The unit ordered us not to spread, but in fact, I had been reminding my neighbors to pay attention to this matter in the owners' group of our community. I believed I was definitely not the only one among the medical personnel doing this, but it is too small to rely on personal strength.
We also dare not publish on the Internet, for fear of being labeled as ""spreading rumors"" and ""creating panic"".
On January 20, Academician Zhong said in an interview with Bai Yansong that ""it is certain that the human-to-human infection"", which made people pay more attention to it.
We are in the front line, and we have seen clearly before that this virus is contagious.
There were 3 patients in a ward, and there was no communication with each other. All 3 were viral lungs.
There was also a young man, who is very handsome. He said that the local media reports were so understated that he continued to work after being infected. As a result, he infected everyone in the same office.
I lived separately from my family at that time.
It was the saddest day for me, and I felt oppressed.
As a medical staff, I must obey discipline.
But I didn't know why we can't say anything.

3. Since January 23, after the lockdown of the city, the hospital has been surrounded by swarming patients, and the treatment was under great pressure
After Academician Zhong issued an early warning, many citizens rushed into the hospital and asked for examination.
Have you seen the video of the crowded fever clinic in Wuhan Union Hospital on January 23?
Although 7 new hospitals were added to treat fever patients in an emergency on the January 22, and then 2 batches were added in succession, hoping to achieve special treatment for diseases, the epidemic spread because of the loss of control in the early stage, and the idea of special treatment could not be realized at all.
From January 23, when the city was locked down, to January 26, when the traffic control started at 0: 00, there were at least 5 or 6 hundred people doing CT every day in our hospital, and there was no way to maintain the scene order.
There are a little fewer people in the past 2 days, and there were almost 200 suspected cases in one day. Our whole hospital has only 200 beds in quarantine ward, and now the general departments are basically closed, and we are fully dealing with fever.
Do you think this situation is urgent or not?
Other hospitals were similar, so you only needed to see how difficult it is to be hospitalized.
All relatives and friends were asking for help, but if you want to be hospitalized at this time, to be honest, even the hospital leadership couldn’t solve the problem.
I have been doctor for so many years, and my heart has not hardened.
Yesterday, I saw the old couple, whose children were not around, and came to the hospital trembling. The filming situation was very bad, but there was no bed, so they had to go home.
How could we do?
I didn't know, I could only tell them how to quarantine when they go back home.
What a pity, this disease was a great test for the old and weak.
I didn't want to cause panic, but we must let everyone know that this virus is not as deadly as SARS, and the progress of clinical treatment is not so fast, but the infection speed is only strong or weak.
You may not get sick, but you may also be a very poisonous source of infection.
Between hospitals and peers, they have a meeting to study together, or a professional, and there are large groups across hospitals. I heard that there is a large group of radiology departments in the whole province. In recent more than a month, no one dared to speak, probably not knowing what to say.
Radiology Department is so critical.
After the media propaganda, the common people recognized the diagnosis by nucleic acid reagent test. In fact, as everyone knows in hospitals, lung CT is very telling. As long as lung film shows ""highly suspected"", the proportion of diagnosis by nucleic acid test is very high.
The medical personnel in our hospital also took X-ray. If they were suspected, they would start treatment directly, quarantine early, treat early and recover early. The front line was short of manpower. It was too slow to appoint testing institutions and queue up for nucleic acid testing. The time of front-line medical personnel couldn't afford to delay.
In the past two days, the voices of front-line doctors and nurses came out one after another, and there were more reports on TV, and various business groups were a little active.
The protection level of our hospital has been upgraded to three levels, so people must be fully informed of the spread, risk and pathogenicity of the epidemic.
These were the whole process from discovery to spread of the epidemic as I know it. Of course, they were only observations in a small area where I live, but I think it can also explain many problems.
I don't complain to anyone, I don't want to blame anyone, and I don't want people to panic.
Now the country attaches great importance to it, and all parties give full support to it, so we must persist in carrying it down no matter how difficult it is in the front line.
I don't know if I can bear it all the time. I hope people in other cities don't pay such a high price like Wuhan.
(In order to protect the privacy of respondents, Sun Ping is assumed as an alias.
Here, I would also like to thank all the front-line doctors and nurses who have been interviewed by this journal and delivered the truth to readers. )
"

原文標題: 核酸检测“假阴性”，诊疗方案调整了
English title: The nucleic acid test was "false negative", the diagnosis and treatment plan was adjusted
English content:
Wu Juan, who lives in Qingshan District of Wuhan City, never expected father to get a positive result of nucleic acid test.
Since the symptoms such as fatigue and cough appeared on January 26, Wu Juan's father has been waiting for a confirmed diagnosis - if COVID-19 pneumonia (hereinafter referred to as "COVID-19") was not diagnosed, he would not be admitted to hospital.
Because of repeated fever, Wu Juan's father has been weak and unable to stand.
The problem faced by Wu Juan's family was not a single case. The virus nucleic acid test, which has always been the "gold standard" for diagnosis in COVID-19, has a false negative situation in practice.
Xu Shunqing, deputy dean of the School of Public Health, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, said at a press conference in Hubei Province on the evening of February 9 that COVID-19 mainly invaded the lungs, so there was a certain false negative in nucleic acid test, namely, some patients were not detected, that is, missed diagnosis, which may cause some infection sources not really identified, and there was a risk of expansion.
But at the same time, it is very important for the epidemic which is still in the high incidence period to screen out the confirmed patients in the shortest time and then treat them centrally.
At present, nucleic acid test still plays a very important role in the process of diagnosis.
Li Taisheng, director of the Department of Infectious Diseases, Peking Union Medical College Hospital, who participated in the prevention and control of SARS in 2003, said in an interview with The Paper that COVID-19 could be diagnosed as soon as possible through nucleic acid test, which was a more favorable condition compared with the prevention and control in 2003.
At the same time, with the adjustment of the national diagnosis and treatment scheme and the attention of many medical experts, the loopholes brought by false negatives in nucleic acid test are shrinking.
"After this problem was discovered, the National Health Commission tried the 5th edition of COVID-19's diagnosis and treatment plan and began to use CT and clinic as the basis. Now the judgment of the condition is not only the emergence of positive nucleic acid test, but also the clinical standard. There is no fever for 3 consecutive days. CT imaging has improved, and these 3 aspects are combined."
Xu Shunqing said on the evening of February 9.
At noon on the February 11, Wu Juan told The Paper, and father had already been admitted to the centralized isolation point in Qingshan District of Wuhan on the February 10.
They were still waiting for the results of father's second nucleic acid test.
Because of the limited medical conditions at the isolation point, father still had to go to Wuhan No.9 Hospital for injections every day after living in the isolation point.
A "door" that must be passed for diagnosis
Wu Juan didn't realize the seriousness of the epidemic until Wuhan’s “lockdown”.
But she never imagined that the haze of the epidemic would come to her family.
On January 26, the 2nd day of the lunar month, Wu Juan's father started to have symptoms such as soreness in the waist, fatigue and cough.
At this time, only 3 days have passed since Wuhan’s "lockedown".
In order to help father buy anti-inflammatory drugs, Wu Juan went to pharmacies near home, but she couldn't buy them, and even Oseltamivir for treating influenza was sold out.
In desperation, she had to buy 10 boxes of kid Oseltamivir for her 71-year-old father.
At this time, father was still very stubborn.
He always thought that his symptoms were caused by falling asleep when he opened the window to breathe.
Until February 3, father didn't take any medicine, and his physical discomfort became more and more serious.
On the morning of February 4, father was too tired to get up, his face turned red, and his body temperature was measured to be 37.4°C. After going to a community outpatient clinic in Qingshan District for routine blood test, it was found that the ratio of white blood cells and lymphocytes was low, accompanied by fever, so the community hospital suggested that he be sent to CR & WISCO General Hospital for CT examination.
On the same day, the CT diagnosis result was infectious disease of both lungs. The doctor thought it was viral pneumonia and prescribed Oseltamivir and Lianhua Qingwen Granule. He was advised to go home and observe in isolation. If the fever was above 38.5°C, he would go to the hospital again.
Despite the diagnosis results of CT examination, according to the "Diagnosis and Treatment Scheme for Pneumonia Infected with COVID-19 (Trial Fourth Edition)" issued by the National Health Commission at that time, the confirmed cases should have "real-time fluorescent RT-PCR detection of COIVD-19 nucleic acid positive in respiratory tract samples or blood samples". Simply speaking, the nucleic acid test results are positive.
This has become a "gate” that Wu Juan's father must open for whether to be diagnosed.
Doubt of "False Negative"
On the evening of February 4, Wu Juan's father had a high fever of 39°C.
Wu Juan hurriedly sent his father to CR & WISCO General Hospital for medical treatment. Although the hospital was not a designated hospital, it was relatively close to home.
The doctor prescribed medicine for 10 days, and he could only give infusion in outpatient clinic.
Fortunately, in the evening, the doctor told me that he could come to the hospital for nucleic acid test early the next morning, and Wu Juan felt that there would be hope again.
However, the next day, when they arrived at CR & WISCO General Hospital on time, the fever clinic doctor said that there were only 20 nucleic acid test reagents on that day, and there was no name of Wu Juan's father on the registration list. The reagents on that day had been used up, so they had to wait another day before going to the hospital for detection.
Because of repeated fever, Wu Juan's father was unable to stand, so he had to squat down in the corridor of the hospital to rest.
Wu Juan said that on the same day, a leader went to CR & WISCO General Hospital to inspect the epidemic prevention and control work. When watching her father crouching in the hospital corridor, the leader went forward to know the situation, and then arranged for the elderly to take the "green channel", finally achieving the key step of diagnosis - nucleic acid test.
Only when the nucleic acid test is positive her father would be confirmed, and it is possible and qualified for her father to be hospitalized.
“But, what if it’s not positive?”
Wu Juan is still worried about that.
In fact, her worries have reason.
The problem of false negative test of COVID-19 virus nucleic acid has surfaced one after another.
On the evening of February 5, Wang Chen, vice president of Chinese Academy of Engineering and president of Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences, told CCTV “News 1+1” that not all patients could detect nucleic acid positive, but only 30% to 50% of patients with COVID-19 infection were positive.
There are still many false negatives by collecting throat swabs of suspected cases.
On the evening of February 6, Li Wenliang of Central Hospital of Wuhan Eye Hospital, which attracted the attention of the whole network, was critically ill and died after several hours of rescue.
According to the Weibo released by Li Wenliang before his death, he was officially diagnosed after 3 nucleic acid tests, and the results of the first 2 nucleic acid tests were negative.
At noon on February 7, the results of Wu Juan's father's first nucleic acid test were released, which showed negative.
But at this time, father still had a high fever, and his consciousness was somewhat blurred.
In the afternoon, her father went to CR & WISCO General Hospital again for blood routine examination and CT examination. The CT imaging diagnosis was more serious than the first one.
The doctor suggested that Wu Juan's father go to No.9 Hospital for reexamination, because CR & WISCO General Hospital was not a designated hospital, so COVID-19 could not be judged as false negative, and gave her a notice of transfer.
On the morning of February 8, Wu Juan's father went to Wuhan No.9 Hospital and showed the doctor the test results before, but he had to wait for transfusion in the outpatient department first.
The community was still making efforts.
On the morning of February 9, after receiving the telephone notification from the community workers, Wu Juan took her father to the No.9 Hospital for the second nucleic acid test, and the results could be obtained in about 2 to 3 days.
She said that she even expected her father's nucleic acid test to be positive, so that she could be hospitalized as soon as possible.
Zhou Xin, head of the first expert group supporting Hubei Medical Team from Shanghai, also said in an interview with The Paper that false negatives also involve many aspects, including differences in respiratory sensitivity of different people, differences in sampling methods and differences in production of different kit companies, which may cause false negatives for various reasons.
The "supplementary plan" is coming
The appearance of false negative in nucleic acid test also made fine-tuning the diagnosis and treatment scheme for COVID-19.
After the outbreak, the National Plan for “Diagnosis and Treatment of Pneumonia Infected with COVID-19” was continuously updated, and the 5th edition was released by February 5.
In case diagnosis, this version of the diagnosis and treatment plan treats Hubei Province differently from other provinces except Hubei Province.
Other provinces outside Hubei Province are still divided into "suspected cases" and "confirmed cases".
However, Hubei Province added with the classification of "clinical diagnosis".
The standard of "suspected case" has modified to be considered as a suspected case, regardless of epidemiological history, as long as it meets the 2 clinical manifestations of "fever and/or respiratory symptoms" and "normal or decreased white blood cell count or decreased lymphocyte count in early onset".
It’s equivalent to the standard of suspected cases has been relaxed.
Suspected cases with imaging features of pneumonia are clinically diagnosed cases.
The diagnostic criteria for confirmed cases have not changed.
The problem of missed diagnosis caused by false negative nucleic acid test is also attracting the attention of experts.
On the evening of February 9, at the press conference held in Hubei, Xu Shunqing, deputy dean of School of Public Health, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, said that the part invaded by COVID-19 was mainly the lungs, so there was a certain false negative in nucleic acid test, that is, some patients were not detected, which was missed diagnosis, which may cause some infection sources not really identified, and there was a risk of expansion.
Xu Shunqing believed that after this problem was discovered, the 5th edition of the trial diagnosis and treatment plan took clinical symptoms such as CT detection as the basis. Now, the judgment of the disease was not only the appearance of nucleic acid test, but also clinical standards. There was no fever for 3 consecutive days, and CT imaging has improved. These three aspects were combined.
Li Qing, a local person in Wuhan, is the beneficiary of the 5th edition of the diagnosis and treatment plan.
On February 3, Li Qing's parents-in-law and grandmother went to the Tongji Hospital affiliated to Huazhong University of Science and Technology for nucleic acid testing. The results showed that the mother-in-law and grandmother were positive for nucleic acid, and they were hospitalized after being diagnosed with COVID-19.
However, the results of CT showed that the father-in-law had the most serious lung infection among the 3, and it spread, but the results of nucleic acid test were negative, so the doctor asked him to queue up again for nucleic acid test.
Li Qing told The Paper that her father-in-law got the opportunity of hospitalization on February 7, judging by the clinical diagnosis standard because of the serious infection symptoms.
For patients with COVID-19 in Hubei Province, if there are no serious symptoms, in order to reduce the risk of infection, the 5th edition of the trial diagnosis and treatment plan requires the medical personnel at all levels and all kinds of medical institutions to find suspected diseases and clinical diagnosis cases that meet the case definition, and then carry out isolation treatment immediately.
Suspected cases and clinically diagnosed cases should be isolated in a single room, and specimens should be collected for pathogen detection as soon as possible.
Discharge standards are no longer single
Liu Tong’s 70-year-old mother from Wuhan, was admitted to the isolation ward because the results of 2 nucleic acid tests were negative and could not be diagnosed, but she had certain symptoms of pulmonary infection.
His mother fell ill on January 23.
After becoming a suspected case, Liu Tong's mother was isolated in the ward of Wuhan No.8 Hospital.
From January 26 to now, she has finished 2 nucleic acid tests, and the hospital has not informed him of the results.
However, the announcement of the hospital showed that it was negative if it was not notified within 48 hours, so he acquiesced that his mother's result was also negative.
Liu Tong's mother's previous CT examination showed double lung infection.
What worries him more was that, because she was not a confirmed patient, his mother lives in a six-person room instead of a single-room isolation ward, which was filled with people like his mother who cannot be diagnosed.
Liu Tong was worried about whether there will be cross infection if there is false negative.
Fortunately, his mother's current physical condition tended to be stable, but the epidemic situation was still at a high incidence. Liu Tong cannot confirm whether mother can be discharged from hospital, and whether she is not a COVID-19 patient or contagious.
"I can only stay for a few more days."
He said.
For patients who have recovered from hospital, nucleic acid test was also a necessary procedure.
The trouble of false negative also exists.
In the trial of the 4th edition and the previous "Diagnosis and Treatment Plan for Pneumonia Infected with COVID-19", the criteria for releasing isolation and discharge of patients with COVID-19 are that their body temperature has returned to normal for more than 3 days, their respiratory symptoms have obviously improved, and they have been tested negative for respiratory pathogen nucleic acid twice in a row (the sampling interval is at least 1 day), so they can be released from isolation and discharged or transferred to corresponding departments for treatment of other diseases according to their illness.
If 2 consecutive nucleic acid tests for infected people are false negative, it will affect the judgment of recovered patients.
The corresponding supplement appeared in the 5th edition of "Diagnosis and Treatment Scheme of Pneumonia Infected with COVID-19".
The requirements of discharge standard are increased, and it is necessary to judge whether discharge is possible from 3 aspects: nucleic acid test, clinical symptoms and lung imaging.
Zhou Xin told The Paper that, generally speaking, patients who meet the nucleic acid test and are negative twice can be discharged safely.
It will be more scientific and safe to go home and quarantine for two weeks after discharge.
"To reduce false negatives, sampling should be accurate and the sampling method should be correct."
Zhou Xin said that the medical personnel for sampling should receive standardized training.
The sputum coughed by patients can be sampled, and the lavage fluid can also be used for nucleic acid detection. If the samples of deep respiratory tract can be obtained, its sensitivity and specificity are very high.
For most patients, it can be detected accurately.

Li Taisheng, director of the Department of Infectious Diseases, Peking Union Medical College Hospital, who participated in the prevention and control of SARS in 2003, said in an interview with The Paper that COVID-19 could be diagnosed as soon as possible through nucleic acid test, which was a more favorable condition compared with the prevention and control in 2003.
Wu Juan told The Paper that, on the morning of February 10, father was admitted to the centralized isolation point in Qingshan District, Wuhan.
They were still waiting for the results of father's second nucleic acid test.
(Wu Juan, Li Qing and Liu Tong are pseudonyms, and intern Yan Caiqi also contributed to this article. )
This journal edited by Chang Chen

原文標題: 华南海鲜市场余氏家族财富增长史：神秘商人如影相随 与武汉国资有交集
English title: Wealth growth history of Yu family in Huanan seafood market: the mysterious relationship with business and Wuhan state assets department
English content:
The weather in Wuhan has been cold for several days in recent days. Merchant with surname of Wang who once sold aquatic products in the Seafood Wholesale Market at No.207 Development Avenue, Jianghan District, Wuhan said: "Every time we go out and come back, we must disinfect our clothes with alcohol."
South China Seafood Wholesale Market, was proved as the source of COVID-19.
On January 1, 2020, after the South China Seafood Wholesale Market was completely closed, the expert group conducted virus traceability research.
After the market was closed, the above-mentioned merchant with surname of Wang, who still had hope of reopening the market, did not wait for the official survey results.
Around January 8, seeing that the situation is getting more and more urgent, she gave the workers the holiday to go home in advance.
Until January 26, the official side announced the research progress.
According to the China CDC, the expert group quarantined COVID-19 from South China Seafood Wholesale Market, proving that the virus originated from wild animals sold in South China Seafood Wholesale Market.
At present, the COVID-19, which started from South China Seafood Wholesale Market, has spread rapidly through the chain of wild animals infecting to human and human infecting to others.
By the time of being published, there have been more than 2,700 confirmed cases and more than 5,000 suspected cases.
The wild taste on the tip of the tongue has become a frightening "poison", and the largest seafood wholesale market in South China and its boss behind the scenes have aroused media attention for a while.
South China Seafood Wholesale Market belongs to Wuhan South China Real Estate Group Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "South China Group"), a local enterprise in Wuhan, and is controlled by Yu's family.
At present, shareholders Yu Tian and Yu Qize each hold 50% of shares, and they are siblings.
According to Netease Qingliu Studio, South China Group was founded by Yu Zhusheng (Yu Tian's father). At present, Yu Zhusheng has been about 60 years old and basically in retirement. The specific business of Yu’s family has been handed over to professional managers, and Yu’s family mainly focus on personnel and finance, of which Yu Tian is mainly responsible for finance.
South China Group made its fortune mainly by purchasing land around Wuhan and Hubei rural areas, and then dabbled in warehousing and farmers' markets.
Among them, South China Seafood Wholesale Market was developed, constructed and operated by South China Group in 2011. It was once accused by public opinion of violent demolition and the use of triad forces because of the demolition of the project.
Chen Zhixiang, a key figure, always accompanied the expansion of the wealth map of Yu’s family , and the 2 parities also cooperated to open a pawn company to engage in usury business.
Chen Zhixiang has many connections with Wuhan state-owned assets system. Yu's family can also find contact with people in Hubei state-owned assets system.
Fame rises: real estate projects are accused of "violent demolitions"
South China Group first started from Yu Zhusheng's contract team.
According to China Business Journal, Yu Zhusheng was born in the village of Wuhan in 1962. He did not graduate from primary school and had a low education level.
He has 1 son and 1 daughter with his ex-wife, namely Yu Tian and Yu Qize.
A person who had worked with Yu Zhusheng earlier told Netease Qingliu Studio that Yu Zhusheng started early and started to work step by step as a construction team.
As early as 2008, most of the real estate projects he started to engage in were cooperative development with various township governments, buying lands in some remote places, relying on low-cost cooperative development and construction, earning differential returns and making a fortune.
Industrial and commercial information also supports the above-mentioned person's statement.
In 1990s, Yu Zhusheng was mainly engaged in pile foundation and earthwork construction and concrete supply, etc., and successively established Wuhan South China Pile Machinery Co., Ltd. and Wuhan South China Concrete Supply Center.
According to publicly available materials, Yu Zhusheng began to contact real estate development in 2000.
In 2017, the average selling price of the real estate "Huawei Commercial and Residential Building" developed in that year was RMB 10,000/square meter, and the surrounding real estate was around RMB 30,000/square meter.
the turning point of Yu Zhusheng's real estate business appeared around 2006.
He developed 2 projects that were widely known to Wuhan people - one is the South China Seafood Wholesale Market, which is the source of pneumonia epidemic, and the other is the South China International Plaza, which is a high-end real estate under the South China Group; Both plots are reconstruction projects of Tangjiadun Village in Jianghan District, Wuhan.
In 2006, Yu Zhusheng chose this land.
According to the announcement of a land agreement transfer plan published by Wuhan Natural Resources and Planning Bureau in 2006, 24,000 square meters of land located in Tangjiadun Village, Tangjiadun Street was transferred to Yu Zhusheng's Wuhan Huawei Property Development Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Huawei Property") at a price of RMB 100 million after Land Resource Bureau researching.
South China Seafood Wholesale Market emerged from the ground and is positioned as the largest seafood market in Central China, with a construction area of 50,000 square meters and accommodating thousands of shops.
It is worth noting that the Tangjiadun "Village in City" reconstruction project involves demolition, which once attracted much attention because of "violent demolition".
The demolition party exposed in the public information includes Wuhan Huawei Property Development Co., Ltd. (responsible person Yu Zhusheng, hereinafter referred to as "Huawei Property").
Some villagers in Tangjiadun once clashed with the demolition party for the low compensation fee for demolition, and even suffered bloody casualties.
Some villagers initiated an administrative lawsuit against Jianghan District People's Government in 2012 because the local government did not make it public according to the procedures.

In the first-instance judgment ((2014) EJAXCZ No.00008) published by Jiang 'an District People's Court of Wuhan City in 2014, the court ruled that Jianghan District Government should give a reply within days to the villagers' request to disclose the specific payment and use of land acquisition compensation subsidies for the "Village in City" reconstruction project.
By intervening in the Tangjiadun Village Reconstruction Project, Yu Zhusheng and his South China Group were able to enter the vision of Wuhan public.
But the outside world is still curious, why did the little-known small developer get the Tangjiadun project plot in 2006?
By contrast, the developers of other projects in Tangjiadun are all developed by “Wuhan Joint Venture Vanke Real Estate Co., Ltd.”, which is a cooperation between Wuhan State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission and Vanke.
What is more noteworthy is that it is at the key turning point of Tangjiadun Project that a mysterious businessman began to surface.
In the public information of that year, one of the demolition parties was Huawei Property, and there were also Wuhan Sun Property Development Co., Ltd. and Wuhan Zeshenghe Real Estate Development Co., Ltd..
The chairman of both companies is Chen Zhixiang.
In the social relations of Yu family, this person is a key figure.
Key person and Wuhan state-owned assets
From the industrial and commercial information, Chen Zhixiang cooperated closely with the Yu family.
Netease Qingliu Studio combed down the corporate map behind Yu's family, and found that Chen Zhixiang and his close relative Xiong Qiang appeared in the ownership structure of many companies.
As early as 2009, Chen Zhixiang controlled Wuhan Sun Property Development Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Sun Property") and Yu Zhusheng's South China Seafood Market Co., Ltd. established a pawn company-Wuhan Fusheng Pawn Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Fusheng Pawn"), which involved many large-scale usurious loan in disguise.
According to several judgments inquired by Netease Qingliu Studio, Fusheng Pawnshop has granted millions or even tens of millions of loans to many natural persons, which were actually private loans, and the lending rates all exceed the upper limit of “the Supreme People's Court's Provisions on Several Issues Concerning the Application of Laws in the Trial of Private Lending Cases” (hereinafter referred to as the "Supreme Court Lending Regulations"), and they are judged as usury by the court, and those exceeding the interest rates are not supported.
Xiong Qiang, a close business person of Chen Zhixiang, served as assistant to the general manager of Wuhan Vanke Real Estate Co., Ltd. from 2001 to 2014, and then left Vanke to work as an executive in a company controlled by Chen Zhixiang.
In 2014, he joined as the chairman of Wuhan Kaisheng Economic and Trade Development Co., Ltd. controlled by Chen Zhixiang, and since August 2016, he has served as the chairman of Dalian Friendship (000679.SH) controlled by Chen Zhixiang.
Chen Zhixiang, Yu Tian (daughter of Yu Zhusheng) and Xiong Qiang also took shares in Wuhan Shengshi Tianlai Culture Communication Partnership (Limited Partnership), holding 32.5%, 25% and 2.5% respectively.
In association with Chen Zhixiang, Xiong Qiang and others, the Yu family began to aim real estate projects from Wuhan to the outside of the province in the later period.
In March 2017, Yu Tian and Xiong Qiang invested 1:1 to establish Wuhan Zhujiu Economic and Trade Development Co., Ltd., and the latter obtained 50% equity of Shaanxi Wancheng Investment Development Co., Ltd. through agreement transfer.
In the same year, Yu Tian and Xiong Qiang invested 1:1 to establish Wuhan Hezhu Economic and Trade Development Co., Ltd., and the latter established Xi 'an Zehe Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. together with Xi 'an Vanke Real Estate Development Co., Ltd., in which Xi 'an Vanke was the controlling shareholder with 70% shares and Wuhan Zhujiu held 30% shares.
However, the outside world still didn't know who this "Chen Zhixiang" is.
According to casual information, Chen Zhixiang is from Jianghan District, Wuhan, and is the executive director of Wuhan Sun Property Development Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Sun Property"), and Sun Property is held by Chen Zhixiang and his mother Yang Cuixiang.
Chen Zhixiang’s development properties were only in Wuhan area.
This is the information disclosed by the company when Chen Zhixiang entered Dalian Friendship (000679.SH) in 2016.
According to the disclosure announcement in July of that year, Wuxin Investment Holdings (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Wuxin Shenzhen") received 28% of the original controlling shareholder of Dalian Friendship with 1.3 billion cash and became the controlling shareholder of Dalian Friendship.
The actual controller of Dalian Friendship was changed to Chen Zhixiang.
What is worth paying attention to is that Chen Zhixiang entered Dalian Friendship, in fact, he joined hands with Wuhan SASAC.
According to the announcement, Wuxin Shenzhen, the transferee of Dalian Friendship Control, has its corporate shareholders including Wuhan Kaisheng Economic and Trade Development Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Kaisheng Economic and Trade"), Wuhan Hengsheng Jiaye Economic and Trade Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Hengsheng Jiaye") and Wuhan Credit Investment Group Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Wuxin Investment Group"), with the shareholding ratio of the three parties being 38%, 22% and 40%.
Dalian Friendship disclosed that Kaisheng Economic & Trade and Hengsheng Jiaye are both enterprises controlled by natural person Chen Zhixiang, and Wuxin Investment Group is a credit guarantee enterprise under Wuhan SASAC.
This means that Chen Zhixiang and Wuhan SASAC have a substantial shareholding ratio of 60% and 40% in Wuxin Shenzhen.
Dalian Friendship said that there is no relationship between Chen Zhixiang and Wuxin Investment Group, and there is no concerted action arrangement.
However, one detail is that among the members of Dalian Friendship Board of Directors after Chen Zhixiang took office, 2 new directors, besides Xiong Qiang representing Chen Zhixiang, the other is Li Jian, who is a member of Wuhan State-owned Assets System, and 2 new members of the Board of Supervisors, including Chairman Gao Zhichao and Supervisor Fan Sining, are all members of Wuhan SASAC System.
That is to say, in the listed companies actually controlled by Chen Zhixiang, Wuhan State-owned Assets System is actually stronger than Chen Zhixiang in the seats of directors and supervisors.
On January 8, 2020, the company announced that its controlling shareholder Wuxin Shenzhen had signed a share transfer agreement with Wuhan Development and Investment Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Wuhan Kaitou") after Dalian Friendship was deeply mired in litigation disputes over overdue debts and equity transfer of its subsidiaries.
After the transfer is completed, the actual controller of Dalian Friendship will be changed from Chen Zhixiang, which is controlled by Wuxin Investment, to Wuhan SASAC, the actual controller of Wuhan Kaitou.
The public records show that the "cooperation" between Chen Zhixiang and Wuhan SASAC is not limited to Dalian Friendship.
Wuxin Investment also appeared in the equity battle of another listed company, New Huangpu (600638.SH).
In June, 2017, Wuxin Investment acquired 32.75% of the rights and interests of the new Huangpu by purchasing trust.
When China Times reported the above-mentioned equity competition of New Huangpu, it quoted people familiar with the matter as saying that the sources of funds of Wuxin Shenzhen and Wuxin Investment Group were probably related to Wuhan Financial Holding. When the reporter asked whether Wuxin Shenzhen belonged to Wuhan Financial Holding Group (referred to as Wuhan Finacial Holding for short), the insider blurted out that it was, but when asked in detail, he faltered.
In addition, Wuhan Changsheng Industrial Co., Ltd. was established in cooperation between Chen Zhixiang and the holding enterprises of Wuhan SASAC, in which Sun Property of Chen Zhixiang holds 49% of the shares, and the shareholders of the other two companies are holding enterprises of Wuhan SASAC.
According to the data collected, the company is mainly engaged in real estate development business, and has successively developed projects such as Sunshine Mansion, Tianli Garden, Dingxiu Crystal City, Ink Qinghua and Dingxiu Palaza.
The Yu's family can also find a connection with the state-owned assets system.
Yu Zhusheng, who is engaged in real estate-related business, registered as an advertising company "Wuhan Shenghua Advertising Co., Ltd." in January 2003.
Another natural person shareholder of the company is Wang Houfang.
According to the related information of Qixinbao, Wang Houfang was the legal representative and chairman of Hubei Hongtai Cultural Travel Industry Investment Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Hongtai Cultural Travel") and Hubei Hongtai Baibuting Investment Management Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Hongtai Baibuting Investment"). 
Among them, Hongtai Cultural Travel is a wholly-owned company of Hubei SASAC after penetration, and Hongtai Baibuting Investment is a holding company of Hubei SASAC after penetration.
Liu Pei is a senior author of Qingliu Studio, based in Beijing.
Produced by Netease Qingliu Studio (WeChat: wangyiqingliu), it is forbidden to reprint without authorization.
Qingliu Studio is the original financial investigation team of Netease Finance. For more information, please pay attention to WeChat official account.

原文標題: 今天的中文互联网，荒诞无比|我的封号日记03
English title: The Internet in China Today is the Most Riduculous. (My Diary After My Wexin Was Blocked 03)
English content:
"It is March 10th, 2020 today, and the third day since my official account has been blocked.
 

 01
 Today is one of the definitive days of the Internet in China ever since Dr. Li Wenliang passed away.
 

 I would like to show you a few pictures first and see if you can understand them.
 

 ""Fighting a war for the people"" accidentally turned into ""fighting a war against the people.""
 

 After the public article ""The Person who Handed out the Whistle — the Warning of Coronavirus (COVID-19) "" was deleted yesterday, countless netizens spread this message and even came up with this idea to repost pictures, sarcastic posts, and posts in English or even oracle bone script to fight against the post censors.
 

 This scene happened in China in 2020.
 

 Merely an article on our homeland cannot be broadcasted with the voice of our homeland. How absurd! How strange!
 As a Chinese, I consider myself quite perseverant. Even though we are not able to complete a sentence in Chinese in our own country when chatting and typing, while the foreign languages that can serve as an alternative do not exist, it’s really touching to be able to hold on to it and to mitigate the risks like this.
 

 "
